author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/37218, in order to prevent further trouble like https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/37215 also in 12_3_X.

#### PR validation:

None (topic branch is the same as in #37218).
title: [12_3_X] Make sure all dictionaries in CUDADataFormats are transient
